name: Moonslim
description:
Ekto is a little alien who came to the moon by chance and discovered under the lunar crust, a moon composed of cheese. By his greediness, he will be led to discover the underground of the moon. He will learn at his own expense that it is already inhabited by a civilization and it will do everything to drive Ekto away.

Moonslim is student project made by 4 student programmers. It is a 2.5D puzzle-platform game where we play Ekto. He will have to avoid the enemies at best, and collect the most precious stones in order to reach the end of the level.

 

  • Lucas BONNAL - Programmer, Game Designer, Level Designer
  • Laora HEINTZ - Programmer,  Game Designer, Graphic Designer
  • Maroua JERBI - Programmer,  Game Designer, Graphic Designer
  • Marvin YONG KAN CHUG - Programmer, Game Designer, Level Designer
